title: Adele, Chris Brown, Kylie Jenner celebrate Drake's birthday shindig
text:
Snoop Dogg, Chris Brown and Adele were all partying together (Picture: Backgrid)

Drake was joined by the likes of Chris Brown, Adele and Future as the rapper celebrated his birthday at Goya Studios in Hollywood on Wednesday night.

P Diddy, Kim Kardashian’s pal Larsa Pippen. Snoop Dogg and French Montana were all also in attendance with French revealing a blindingly dazzling piece of jewellery he got for Drake, said to be worth $175,000 (£135,000).

The event saw many of the guests pull out their black-tie best with Adele wearing a stunning velvet black gown with off-the-shoulder neckline and her classic beehive hairstyle while Future rocked a tuxedo and bow tie.

Snoop, however, decided to be as comfortable as possible in a bright green tracksuit with a Louis Vuitton bag.

He apparently was in such a good mood that as he left the venue he handed out $100 (£77) bills to waiting fans.

Adele wore a stunning black velvet gown (Picture: Backgrid)

Kylie Jenner was joined by BFF Stassie Karanikolaou (Picture: Backgrid)

While Chris went a little more lowkey (Picture: Backgrid)

And Snoop went for comfort over style (Picture: Backgrid)

The party was to celebrate Drake turning 34 but the Canadian star seemed to be making the most of his birthday celebrations as the day prior he also celebrated with pals at Poppy, another Hollywood venue.

Rihanna was also in attendance at that shindig, proving that the pair seem to be on good terms again after she claimed in 2018 that they had no relationship.

French was also in attendance (Picture: Backgrid)

And he showed off the jewellery he got for Drake, said to be worth $175,000 (Picture: Backgrid)

‘Rihanna made an appearance and stayed for several hours. She was with two girlfriends and was escorted to Drake’s table by security,’ a source shared with E! News.

‘Her and Drake were talking for a while and were smiling and laughing. It seemed like a very pleasant interaction and they looked like they were having fun together as friends.’

Future pulled out his best tuxedo (Picture: Backgrid)

Adele (Picture: Backgrid)

It’s been years since the pair have been spotted together after Rihanna, 31, admitted they had grown apart.

The musicians had famously dated on and off for several years but RiRi eventually put an end to their romance and she’s now happily dating billionaire businessman Hassan Jameel.

But it sounds as though they’ve put the past behind them and are back on friendly terms again.

What a brilliant birthday gift.
